page.title: 10Mayor of Henley Cont.
page.content: There is one more occasion when the Mayor wears full robes, it is Mayor Making day. It is held in the Mayor's parlour. The Mayor swaps robes with the new Mayor and then the new Mayor is officially Mayor. No one else is allowed to wear the chain it is worth 20 thousand pounds. One time when the Mayors wife went abroad she had to insure it and thats how they knew how much the chain is worth. The chain was lost for a year and when they found it it had a chip, the town clerk has not got around to sending it to the jewellers so it still has the chip.
